channel.title: Can't change what the npc's say?
channel.description:
Ok, this is exactly what i did.... ____________________________________________________________________________________________I went to npc handler, typed ctr f. then i searched the npc id. I found it, i changed what it was saying like, its said pure shop, i made it say k0 shop. Also, i made sure i left the quotes on. then i saved it. then i compiled. then restarted my server. and it still said the same thing. I did it before, but it wont work now for some reason....If you could please help me my server is online now at
iownyou.servegame.com mods, please dont lock this..im trying to get someon to help after i find out how to do it you can delte if you like. Thanx alot ~twinke42~

item.title: Can't change what the npc's say?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

open up ur server and search for
npchandler.java
search for the text the npc is saying then replace with wut you want.

Read full topic
